segments.text: I realize how quickly things can spiral out of control in a moment of distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s concentration on her chores blinds her to the unfolding risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Looking at the children, there’s an innocent joy in their mischief, but it feels so misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s bittersweet; these small acts of rebellion are so common yet so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As the boy stretches for a cookie, I feel a swell of anxiety rise within me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he doesn’t make it? What if he slips?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a snapshot of life, filled with joy, danger, and the unknowingness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
